title: Lesbian Lust
description: Tracey and Adele are live-in lesbian lovers. As much as they enjoy their alternate lifestyle and sexual existence, they both feel something is missing: A man. Deciding it would be fun to play with a guy occasionally, they post a profile on an adult dating site and attract hunky Michael. He joins the very sexy and very horny women for a night of lust and sexual fulfillment. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
